text: Christopher "Big Black" Boykin (January 13, 1972 â€“ May 9, 2017) was an American entertainer and musician. He was best known for his role on MTV's Rob & Big, which followed him and his co-star, skateboarder Rob Dyrdek. He was born in Raleigh, Mississippi. Boykin died on May 9, 2017 in Plano, Texas from heart failure after being hospitalized for a heart attack at the age of 45.Report: Christopher Boykin Died of Heart Failure ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1972 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American television presenters Category:Businesspeople from Mississippi Category:American television personalities Category:Musicians from Mississippi Category:Entertainers from Mississippi
